page.title: 16Longworth Shop
page.content: Longworth shop is at least 100 years old.Since 1930 there have been about 8 different owners.The shop was modernized in 1963.It used to be a butchers shop. About 150 customers come into the shop each day and most people in the village are regular customers.Thursday is the shops busiest day.Sweets and chocolate are the most popular thing they sell.Most of the customers come from Longworth .All the children in the village come into the shop sometimes.The post office brings in most of the people. In 1671 there was a cobbler in the village also a blacksmith ,a draper ,a grocer,a shoemaker and a stonemason.
